title: [Gameplay] Risen Fiddlestick's Scythe clips through his "hand"
body:
During his idle animation the scythe (aka a sickle because dayum that thing tiny.), floats right through the floating scarab "hand" holding it. Not sure if that can be changed or anything but yeah really bad levitating clipping issue.


Thanks

replies.body:
Hey MedicantBias66! 

Thanks for the report! We're currently aware of the issue and working on it! :]

Cool! Fiddle is one of my faves, so i'm glad to see his skins getting some rito love!

Thanks again!
